channel.title: Reseed on I2P - The Invisible Internet Project
channel.description: Recent content in Reseed on I2P - The Invisible Internet Project

item.title: Help your Friends Join I2P by Sharing Reseed Bundles
item.description: Most new I2P routers join the network by bootstrapping with the help of a reseed service. However, reseed services are centralized and comparatively easy to block, considering the emphasis on de-centralized and un-blockable connections in the rest of the I2P network. If a new I2P router finds itself unable to bootstrap, it may be a possible to use an existing I2P router to generate a working “Reseed bundle” and bootstrap without the need of a reseed service.
